name: Bali Spirit Hotel and Spa

reviews.text: We (family of three) stayed in River Villa. We loved the place. The pool was superb, perfect for a quick dip mid afternoon dip before getting ready to head into town again. My seven year old loved drinking lemonade at the pool bar (whilst sitting in the pool, sooo cool) Regular Free of Charge shuttle into Ubud (5 minute drive) but less than 5000 ind rupiah (30p) each at other times.
reviews.title: Paradise at Bali Spirit hotel

reviews.text: Villa on two floors - downstairs consisted of kitchen area with double sink, fridge and kettle (tea and coffee sachets), twin bedroom which is curtained off from the lounge/kit area, outside bathroom (with bath, very good overbath shower, loo and sink and rack to dry swimsuits on (plenty of plants and wildlife as well!), lounge/hall area with small table and two chairs plus a balcony with small table and two chairs. Upstairs is just a double bedroom (four poster with mostiquo net) - note: no mostiquo nets downstairs, but our daughter immune to them so unsure if they were a problem.
reviews.title: Not suitable for families with small children

likes.disliked: — early closure of pool and spa

reviews.text: Property built on hill, so everyone feels very secluded. Breakfast was a difficult choice - everything but the cereal was very very good. Choice of noodles or rice or full cooked or cereal all served with fruit/fruit juice + tea/coffee - milk not like English milk - but we stuck to the excellent juices instead.
reviews.title: Bali Spirit will keep your spirits high

description: A tranquil place to return to at day's end, where traditional Balinese architecture, furnishing, rich in natural materials, in enhanced by the luxurious appointments and services expected of a fine hotel. Views from every room of the hotel.
